casebody.data:
APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

2009-1682. Naples v. State.

Trumbull App. No. 2008-T-0092, 2009-Ohio-8938. Discretionary appeal accepted; cause held for the decision in 2008-2602, State v. Bodyke, Huron App. Nos. H-07-040, H-07-041, and H-07-042, 2008-Ohio-6387; cause consolidated with 2009-2026, Naples v. State, Trumbull App. No. 2008-T-0092, 2009-Ohio-3938; and briefing schedule stayed.

Pfeifer, J., dissents.
